ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantClaimListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantClaimListController

  • public class ClaimantClaimListController
extends Object
    This ClaimantClaimListController class controls the action of ClaimList for claimant. This controller class will displays a list of Claim, add new Claim to the ClaimList, change the status and delete Claim. It will be used when the claimant asks to access to the ClaimList.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    IOException, JsonElement
